basics.name: Almas
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Hi, my name is Almas Abdrazak.My experience in IT area is over 3 years. I started as  Android Developer (Kaspi Bank).Now I'm interesting in working for BACK-END services.I have been working for huge enterprise applications and startups as well so I know how to deliver features requested by business in the shortest amount of time. Also I'm interested in Database Theory and I'm a big fun of Postgres and Cassandra. In a free time I contribute to opensource, wirte my own projects and learn Japanese(because why not).

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
